actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE nc_3vr7___smsRegex SET
    smsSender = {{smsSender.text}},
    smsRegex = {{smsRegex.text}},
    sampleSms = {{sampleSms.text}},
    discardSms = {{discardSms.isDisabled ? 0 : 1}},
    hasBalance = {{hasBalance.isDisabled ? 0 : 1}},
    accountType = {{accountType.selectedOptionValue}},
    messageType = {{messageType.selectedOptionValue}},
    mc1 = {{mc1.selectedOptionValue}},
    mc2 = {{mc2.selectedOptionValue}},
    mc3 = {{mc3.selectedOptionValue}},
    mc4 = {{mc4.selectedOptionValue}},
    mc5 = {{mc5.selectedOptionValue}},
    mc6 = {{mc6.selectedOptionValue}},
    mc7 = {{mc7.selectedOptionValue}},
    mc8 = {{mc8.selectedOptionValue}},
    dateFormats = {{formatsForDate.selectedOptionValues.join('@')}},
    transactionType = {{transactionType.selectedOptionValue}},
    Tested = 1,
    Failed = 0,
    Success = 1,
    isDuplicate = 0
  WHERE id = {{parseInt(smsRegexId.text)}}; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!
